alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 2:41AM MST until December 15 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Yuma, Aguila Valley, Southeast Yuma County, Gila River Valley, Tonopah Desert, Gila Bend and Sonoran Desert National Monument. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert; Yuma
